articles.title: They didn't all have to die -- a moment of reflection as US Covid deaths reach 100,000
articles.description: The first tragedy of America's bleak coronavirus milestone is that 100,000 people didn't have to die. The second is that no one knows how many more will perish before the pandemic fades.
